relation: some of the dorms are amazing
from what Ive experienced it is not a cupcake school very mind stimulating
try to get you housing situated as soon as possible before its to late
a strong professor core. Very helpful with selecting classes. Always helps to try and help you with whats best for you.
pageTitle: East Stroudsburg University of Pennsylvania Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {260752=There's always something to do here on campus. Something is going on every day, whether it be lounge games, parties on the quad, or free fairs! Come April, ESU will never be quiet during the day. It's lively and inviting!, 276487=East Stroudsburg has many alumni that are very successful such as Jim Saxton who was an U.S Representative from 1980 to 2009. Moreover, one has created a new boxing device called the quiet punch which will become useful as time goes by., 174894=I have yet to take a class at ESU but I start later in August but I believe that any college classes can be difficult but if one works hard then all the hard work will pay off in the end. I will be studying nursing so I know I will have a lot of work to do but ESU offers programs to help students who need help in and particular subject., 285342=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC, 90369=Your roommates are going to be are going to be pretty cool. the actual campus is currently renovating its dorms. Laurel hall dorms are great, you are literally right next to the main classrooms, the buildings are almost touching. Some of the Dorms are not as convent and are a bit antiquated. Many of the Dorms were build't in 1976 and can get cold on the lower floors especially, but construction on three new buildings have been completed since 2011 the rooms are warm, modern and include a kitchen area.}
